1 cup low sodium soy sauce,1/4 cup sake,3 tablespoons rice vinegar,1/3 cup brown sugar, or more to taste,1 tablespoon sesame seeds,1/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper,2 teaspoons canola or peanut oil,1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil,1 teaspoon kosher salt,1/2 teaspoon pepper,2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1 1/2 inch pieces,2 teaspoons fresh ginger,1 teaspoon minced garlic,1 bunch green onions, thinly sliced, divided,1 1/2 cups cooked rice,,
